title: Heart
description: Available on Amazon and Smashwords. What if the person whose memory you held on to isn't the person you thought he was?Lucas Mayer is a hit-man, running from his past, and the one person he can think of having a future with is Roman Woodrow, a guy who's always had trouble keeping steady relationships. Among the many addictions of Roman, is the devious and manipulative, Daniel Jones.
